document.full_text: a u.s. university defended spending about $32,000 to bring reality television star nicole "snooki" polizzi to campus this week, despite several students questioning if it was a wise use of money.
document.title: rutgers university defends snooki's $32,000 appearance
lines_and_colors: a u.s. university defended spending about $32,000 to bring reality television star nicole "snooki" polizzi to campus this week, despite several students questioning if it was a wise use of money.
